Job Title: Full Stack Lead Developer - Python / Django
Job Description: We re looking for an experienced and talented Python Developer (Django Framework) who can architect, develop DB Schema and Restful APIs for our clients based on their custom requirements, by understanding their business objectives.  Key Responsibilities:    Candidate should be able to architect, develop DB Schema and Restful APIs for our clients based on their custom requirements, by understanding their business objectives.     Implementation of end-to-end Solution Development process, and Solution Development Lifecycle process, and to ensure that all products are built with the delivery quality for the appropriate stages- alpha, beta production   Essential Skills:    Experience in Python for more than 4 years, out of which more than 2 years are into Django framework     Experience in designing relational, NoSQL databases like MySQL, Postgres, MongoDB etc     Experience working in Javascript front-end frameworks like AngularJS/React JS/Vue JS     Proficient with client scripting technologies like jQuery, Javascript, AJAX etc     Should be very good at developing Rest Based APIs     Knowledge in AWS Lambda functions     Adherence of best practices for Agile software development cycle     Help to prepare the task-list for a project     Engage team/ coordinators/ Seniors on team meetings/ discussions     Lead a team of 5-10 developers    Qualification: Computer Science Graduates. BTech/BE preferred   Work Experience: Minimum 5 years
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial, Any Graduate in Any Specialization
PG: Medical-MS/MD in psychology, Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization
